src:
三大法人買超台股190.11億元
04 Nov 2019, 15:18 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
台股4日上漲157.32點，收在11556.85點，成交值新台幣1566.04億元。三大法人全數買超，合計買超新台幣190.11億元。中央社製圖 108年11月4日
text:
The three legal entities bought super-unit stocks of 19.011 billion yuan
04 Nov 2019, 15:18 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
Taiwan stocks rose by 157.32 points on the 4th, closing at 11556.85 points, and the transaction value was NT$156.604 billion. The three major legal entities bought all of them, and bought a total of NT$19.011 billion. Central Government Chart November 4, 108
